articles.title: 'Doctor G' Shows the ‘Liberal Man’ a Mirror and It’s Not a Comforting Picture - The Wire
articles.description: Anubhuti Kashyap reverts Hindi cinema’s male gaze and remains in control of her film.
articles.content: Anubhuti Kashyaps Doctor G opens with a Kabir Singh joke. Uday (Ayushmann Khurrana) tells his friend Chaddi (Abhay Mishra) that hes a liberal man a simple man that he isnt possessive like Shahid Kapo… [+6302 chars]
